ratings.comment: Inspiring and truly enjoyable class. Only one exam in the class. Fun projects and fascinating material. Take this class!

Most inspiring Professor and Best Professor that I've ever met in UW. His class really gets you think out of the box as a business student. If you are a Marketing major, definitelt take this class because your view of the concept of marketing will be broadened so much!
One of the most approachable professors I have ever had.  The class was very stimulating and although attendance was not  mandatory I made it a point never to miss this class

One of the most inspiring people I have ever met. Very interesting class. He is a marketing professor who does not think like a business teacher, which is very refreshing. I loved going to class. I would recommend anyone, even if they are not business students, to take this course.

I can honestly say I truly enjoyed this class.  Every day you went into class with a new perspective because you were building on material.  Not your typical business class (good thing!) Allows students to choose (to some extent) how you want to be graded.  Very progressive teaching style!  Only negative is that grading is a bit ambiguous.

Aric is one of the few members left of a unique type of human being. They are few in number, which is a sad thing because the world's need for them is always increasing. They are called "genuine people", and Aric is their paragon. He wears his emotions on his sleeve, and is unafraid of the consequences that such behavior might entail.
Aric is truly brilliant.  He's a visionary and we're amazingly lucky to have him as a professor.

Aric is awesome, inspiring, and very interested in the learning process. He is entirley committed to ensuring you learn, and has created a free-form class to do it. Every reading is interesting, each class was enlightening, and no busy work or dry textbooks are used.Its a liberating experience to see how a class can be taught so you learn.

Aric's class is one of the best I've ever taken. The class made me happy. Amazing perspective on innovation - he really opened my eyes. His unconventional teaching style, intelligence, and (incredible) modesty can't be matched. One of the few professors I actually hope to know the rest of my life. Thanks, Aric!

Aric is by far one of the best professors I have ever had the privilege to take a course with. He is incredibly enthusiastic and open to new ideas, which is a trait not all business professors possess. I would highly recommend taking his class - you will be so happy that you did!

One of the best professors and classes I've taken at the University. Definitely tied for my favorite and most useful marketing class. Aric has an unconventional teaching style that is helpful for actually retaining the information instead of just forgetting it after you take the test. I would definitely recommend this class to all!
This class is the best.  Interesting course content + Daily jokes = #winning
The 3D printer is great! Very modest, which one would not expect from the chair of the marketing department. Great class, learned a lot.
I definitely recommend this class! Aric is funny, inspiring, and interesting. You will leave with a new perspective on innovation and current examples of company efforts in this area.

Best teacher at UW.  He cares about this students and treats them as peers.  Even though the class is not difficult you will learn more in it than any other class because Aric makes it fun to learn and stimulates everyone's interest during every class period.  If I could take every class in college with him I would.  Dont miss this class.
This class will change your life. Guaranteed.

Haven't you already heard how awesome this course is?  If further confirmation is needed, I would say that you might want to have an interest in user innovation to really enjoy this course.  No real exams, fun assignments, good discussion...he's a great teacher.

I love him, I love him, I love him, I love him. 440 is an incredible class, and he's one of the coolest guys you'll ever meet. He's brilliant, but very approachable. Class applies to what's happening in the real world; unlike any other I have (or will) take. If you take one class in the business school, take Aric's. Also verrryyy easy on the eyes.
He doesn't get back on defense. And he sometimes takes awful shots. Overall though, he's a good teacher. Class is very interesting and if you need help, he's approachable enough.

I hated this class. It was a waste of my life. He may act like hes open to innovation but he has an opinion of what he thinks Marketing will be in the future and brushed off any students attempts to contradict him. If you are a level headed student who would prefer to learn something...take a different class.

Hands down best professor in the business school. Maybe UW-Madison. Learned more than I have in any other class. He really cares about his students and encourages everyone to participate. He also taught us about things that are actually happening in the world of business TODAY, a rarity in most classes. The rest of the UW needs to catch up to Aric!

Fascinating professor, class is one of the best I've taken. Very different because you won't follow a set syllabus with exact grading requirements laid out. You may find you're not really sure how/what you are being graded on. Be prepared to be flexible and take risks in the class, it's worth it.

Best class offered at this university with the best professor, hands down. You should not be allowed to graduate without taking this class. Not only is it helpful, but it is the most interesting class i have ever taken.

Best class offered at this university with the best professor, hands down. You should not be allowed to graduate without taking this class. Not only is it helpful, but it is the most interesting class i have ever taken.

Professor Aric is the man! Love his attitude towards the subject matter and his democratic grading structure allows students to tailor they grades based on their strengths and weaknesses. By far the most interesting classes I've taken in the School of Business. TAKE THIS CLASS, you will not regret it.

Great professor who really spends a lot of time designing a class that will actually help you learn.  The examples he talks about are AWESOME truly on the cutting edge of NPD. Coursework is very manageable and you will leave with new ways to think about things. Highly recommend.
Awesome class that I recommend everyone take. Aric is brilliant and the course is structured in a really unique way that makes it seem easy while you learn more than you will in any other class.
The BEST class I have taken here at Madison!!! I learned the more in this class than any other classes I have take! He cares about his students and I was sad to leave on the last day!

Probably the best professor and class that I have had at Wisconsin. I actually looked forward to Aric's lectures and coming to class. The power lecture went by a lot faster than most of my regular ones. I highly recommend this class to anyone who can fit it in their schedule!

If you are looking to take a socially-conscious, progressive business class, Aric's NPD venture is the one for you. The class is a refreshing breath of fresh air from the oftentimes bottom-line oriented outlook of the business world.

This class was probably the most enjoyable class I have ever taken. We talk about relevant trends in the business world and innovative product and service development across all industries. Aric is really funny and is a pretty cool guy. He definitely made me laugh a bunch and I think that is rare in a professor. He also loves what he does.

Aric is a great professor because he knows what students like and don't like. His assignments are easy. Exam is easy. He doesn't give you much instructions because he likes you to be creative. He's all about user-based innovation. Just like this site... :) He doesn't give you much reading but he really wants you to learn things well.

Aric is the man, the course is very interesting and he does a great job of allowing everyone to learn in a relatively stress-free way.  You will learn very valuable information in this class regarding innovation today.

Aric is a very friendly and interesting professor who really cares about students.  However, if you like a class that has a structured curriculum you will not get it here.  Very few topics are actually taught, its more about learning companies doing NPD and new innovations.
Best class offered at this university, hands down. Anyone who doesnt take this class should not receive a degree. Extremely interesting and fun class, wish it wasnt over.

BEST TEACHER I HAVE EVER HAD! I know all of these reviews say that, and I was a little concerned he would not live up to the hype, but he did! He lets you pick your own grade distribution so you can do better in the areas you're better at, he is funny, and most of all he made going to class enjoyable.  I recommend taking Aric's class X1000000
Aric is awesome. NPD is a class I really enjoyed attending. One of the only classes I didn't feel discouraged about being successful in.
Awesome teacher! A little bit wacky but it made the class 100x more fun. I would recommend Aric to EVERYONE!!
Awesome teacher. A little off the wall but it made class 100x more fun. Very relaxed atmosphere and interesting course material. Recommend it to everyone!!
my first man crush..seriously this guy is legit.He presents cutting edge material you will not receive from any other class at UW.

Best class I've taken at UW! Aric is an awesome teacher and the class was a lot of fun. There's not a ton of work required, but if you show up to class, which I highly recommend, be ready to learn about something relevant and interesting.
Easy Class. Aric is just a fun guy who truly wants students to enjoy his class.

Seriously the greatest professor I've encountered in my 4 years at UW. He is so experienced and knowledgeable in the field. The class has a laid back/discussion type structure and he is not all worried about grades and exams, he simply wants you to learn and have fun. There are also hands-on learning opportunities. Very cool guy!! TAKE THIS CLASS!!

Unconventional teaching style that sets this class apart from any I've taken at UW. The only class I actually looked forward to this semester. Definitely recommend the Aric as a professor and the class.

Best class I've taken here so far. Unlike most classes this class is very interesting and actually engages you. Homework is actually fun to do and you learn about interesting and relevant material. Aric is an awesome professor. He is super laid back and tells some awesome stories.
He is an amazing instructor. TAKE THIS CLASS!! You'd be missing out if you don't. Its a refreshing reminder of why I chose UW. :)

The class was great. Although I think the material is a bit over-hyped, it was definitely brought some interesting concepts to my attention. Also, Aric is very approachable. When I showed up in his office, he immediately hung up the phone and we talked for two hours. Oh, and he longboards...way cool. That definitely added to his hotness rating.

I LOVED this class! I learned so much from him. He definitely is not a conventional teacher and that's why I enjoyed his class so much. He made us really do some critical thinking that we will use in the working world. I definitely recommend Aric to other students!

I loved this class, and I loved Aric. This was one of the most interesting and useful courses I have taken at UW. All majors should take this, because it's incredibly relevant and fascinating material. I won't stop talking about this one for a long time.

TAKE THIS CLASS-even if you aren't a marketing major!! Aric is a laid back, VERY interesting, and insightful professor that makes the hour 15 class period fly by.  He has a lot of information that everyone can and should learn from him. take this class trust me
Great class. Enjoyable to go to and actually interesting to listen.  Homework exercises are fun and grading is easy.  Highly recommend Aric!
Aric keeps the class very interesting. It was not the best class I took, but overall it was a lot of fun and interesting.

Aric was an awesome professor. He was helpful at all times, and certainly made the class more enjoyable. Very friendly and encouraging of students to participate and learn from class discussions. Flexible with grades to the point that he lets you pick your percentages for each area. Great class and professor. Take this class, & not just for Aric!
Great Prof! Take this class, very fun!

I think every UW professor should be required to student teach for a semester under Aric- he understands students better than any other professor I've had.  Interesting material, fair grading (choose your own distribution), and I know he reads these comments, so Aric: you're the man, keep doing what you're doing.  Everyone else: take this class!
One of the best classes I have ever taken with one of the best professors I have ever had. HIGHLY recommend!

Never before have I been thanked for being a student, but Aric is genuinely grateful to those who enroll, learn, and contribute to his class.  He structures the course so that you will LEARN, not memorize.  Awesome experience.
One of the most interesting and fun classes I've taken at UW. Aric is a great teacher and I recommend this class for anyone in the Business School
He is extremely entertaining!  It was a fun class.

The class was very laid back and fun to attend.  The assignments and exam were more to get you thinking and discussing the material instead of memorizing useless facts. I really enjoyed the class and would recommend taking it.
dude is legit. if you can take one of his classes
Great class, very interesting course topics.

It was a great class. His teaching style is really different and always entertaining. The assessments aren't too difficult but you still learn a lot. The only class that I enjoyed attending this semester
Great hair.

Aric is an excellent professor.  He is truly excited about the subject material and enjoys sharing it with the class.  He provides great insights into the emerging world of new product development.  I always enjoyed going to his class.
Great Class!
Aric is very interesting and so is the class.  Its fun to attend and takes some work but nothing to crazy.  I learned a lot from the class and the project.

Aric is a really nice guy and is very approachable. He is funny and makes class interesting by using a lot of real life examples and youtube clips. The simulation that you have to do can be really annoying if you don't do well but otherwise the class was relatively enjoyable.

Every single class is a great show. In the beginning, this distracted me from the contents. But over time, I saw that, from the academic point of view, Aric and his NPD course is a lot better that in thought in the beginning. Highly recommended.
He is very random and funny. His topics are very strange at times and awkward.
Aric is an excellent teacher.  As an expert in innovation, he brings to class material that is both pertinent and cutting edge. His class on new product development is interesting and fun.
Great professor, great class. Really interesting material, fun class.  One of the best classes I've taken in 4 years at UW.
One of the best professors I have had in my four years at UW Madison. Class was engaging and very enjoyable. You determine (within limits) how much each assignment/test counts towards your grade.

He is the best teacher that I've had so far, and I'm a Senior...-_-;; He tries to relate the course materials to the current events (Wikipedia, Threadless, Nokia). He has credible acquaintences for guest lecturers. These factors made the course more interesting. I highly recommend anyone to take MKT 440.
Cool teaching materials and dynamic class
Favorite class of the semester. I always looked forward to it because it was fun and the students were collectively engaged. Enjoyed the array of educational modalities.
Aric is great! I really did learn a lot from the class and it was one of the more applicable classes I have taken during my MBA.  I highly recommend taking a class from him.
Aric made class super fun! He is hilarious! No tests for this class. Just papers and a large group simulation project. He is always willing to help you with any of these things.
I loved this class

Great professor. I learned so many new concepts that inspired me in this class. He is nice and humorous. He is also very knowledgable. We always had a lot of fun in his class. Wish I could take another class taught by him.

super interesting class, really enjoyed the professor. only business class ive taken that i liked. he uses contemporary material and it is a class worth taking. unique professor who gets students interested. Great prof in the land of boring closed minded business professors

the class was really interesting and pretty easy. we watched a lot of youtube videos and discussed aric's iphone frequently. the case is graded pretty strictly but all the other components are straight forward. he even has you choose your grade breakdown. hilarious prof and one of the best i've had

Aric is the best prof I have ever had. I would recommend him to everyone. The class was entertaining and co-created by students throughout the semester. Aric is one of a kind. Everyone should take at least one class with Aric! Aric is a forward thinker and is in front of his peers on all levels.
Aric is a very entertaining teacher.  The class itself did not introduce very many dramatic concepts and there was only one test.  The questions for the test were given in advance.
